name: Karisvale (itch)
description:
I Have Received Word of Your Next Assignment...

Karisvale is a narrative-driven 2D top-down mystery game where the player assumes a private investigator that is hired by the mayor of Karisvale to find a missing person. The more the PI interacts with the town, the more of the mystery behind Karisvale reveals itself.

Features
  • Immersive mystery narrative
  • Authentic 2D art style with modernized twists
  • Beautiful handcrafted locations to explore
  • A plethora of interesting characters, each with unique motives
  • A mesmerizing original sound track
  • Continuously being updated, so be on the lookout for new content!
Credits Brendan TigheGame DesignerReid WestonGame DesignerAnanta Arora
